Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Northbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: NB 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near Woodlawn/55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove and Hyde Park, due to street blockage near Woodlawn/55th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Harlem (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Harlem (Forest Park Branch) due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
